pages.text: The $(major)Mob Sight$(0) Gene occasionally $(minor)gives all nearby mobs the Glowing effect$(0).$(br2)Both the cooldown and radius are configurable, defaulting to 1 second and 32 blocks respectively.$(br2)This gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)• Guardian$(br)• Elder Guardian
